quest.name: Like a Charm
journal: This lonesome lass needs an adventurer with courage.
objectives: Survey the designated location and slay the stray gazelle for its horn.
Deliver the gazelle horn to the lonesome lass.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: By the look of those strange garments, I take it you're an adventurer? If you've a little time to spare, I could sure use your help.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: I was hoping to make a charm for a friend of mine, and I desperately need the horn of a gazelle. They're not easy to come by here in Ala Ghiri, and I could never hunt one on my own. For an adventurer like yourself, I bet it'd be as easy as kicking rocks.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: Normally you'd need to travel pretty far to even find a gazelles, but I've heard a stray was spotted near Miriam's Luck.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: I don't have much, but I'll gladly pay you for its horns if you can find it.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: The officers said they spotted a gazelle near Miriam's luck. I pray it's still there.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: Was it true? Was there really a gazelle up there?

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: Oh, this is wonderful. Thank you! She's going to love the charm I make with this.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: They say the horns of the gazelle are a symbol of strength, you know. She'll need it where she's headed.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: With Ala Ghiri finally liberated from the Garleans, she intends to move to Ul'dah and start a business.

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: I could never do something so bold. After everything we've been through, the world seems like such a scary place. If fate should curse me to be taken by the Garleans again, I'd...I'd...

dialogue.name: FLOWERVENDOR02832
dialogue.text: Never mind me. She's always been the brave one, and I know she'll be fine. Still, I'll feel better knowing she has my charm with her.
